titles.title: To amend Public Law 103-93 to provide additional lands within the State of Utah for the Goshute Indian Reservation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Lands.
Subcommittee Hearings Held. Hearings Printed: H. Hrg. 104-42.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 104-562.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 275.

action.text: Mr. Hansen moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator McCain without amendment. With written report No. 104-348.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 558.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/11/1995--Introduced. Amends the Utah Schools and Lands Improvement Act of 1993 to provide additional Utah lands for the Goshute Indian Reservation.
